mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 THEN '18-30岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 31 AND 40 THEN '31-40岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 41 AND 50 THEN '41-50岁' ELSE '50岁以上' END AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM (SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthdate, CURDATE()) AS age FROM employee) AS t GROUP BY name;
select gender as name, count(1) as value from employee group by gender
select post as name, count(1) as value from employee group by post order by value desc
select id from employee where post = #{post}
